alert.note: Alert for Geneva (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 05 at 1:47PM CDT until July 05 at 2:15PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Geneva County in southeastern Alabama... Northern Holmes County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 215 PM CDT. * At 147 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hartford, or 11 miles east of Geneva, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Esto, Noma, Black, Miller Crossroads, Fadette, Barker Store, Bethlehem, Tendil Crossing, Holland Crossroads, Vaughanville, Ards Crossroads, Cobb Crossroads, Smith Crossroads, Izagora, New Hope, Noma Junction, Baker Settlement and Thurston. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
